languages.text: {n}Неимоверным {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}психическим{/d} усилием вы разжимаете незримые челюсти, сомкнувшиеся на разуме Равора. Вам удается сдержать чудовищную мощь неведомой твари лишь на мгновение, но его достаточно, чтобы вызволить разум кормчего из капкана.{/n}

{n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неимоверным {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}психическим{/d} усилием вы разжимаете незримые челюсти, сомкнувшиеся на разуме Равора. Вам удается сдержать чудовищную мощь неведомой твари лишь на мгновение, но его достаточно, чтобы вызволить разум кормчего из капкана.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With a tremendous mental effort, you unclench the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You manage to hold back the monstrous power of the unknown entity for only a brief moment, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from the trap.{/n}

{n}With a tremendous mental effort, you unclench the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You manage to hold back the monstrous power of the unknown entity for only a brief moment, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from the trap.{/n}

{n}With a tremendous mental effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

{n}With a tremendous mental effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

{n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

{n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un tremendo esfuerzo {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d}, logras forzar las mandíbulas invisibles que sujetan la mente de Ravor. Solo logras contener el inmenso poder del ser desconocido durante un instante, pero es suficiente para liberar la mente de tu maestro timonel de su prisión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un tremendo esfuerzo mental, logras forzar las mandíbulas invisibles que sujetan la mente de Ravor. Solo logras contener el inmenso poder del ser desconocido durante un instante, pero es suficiente para liberar la mente de tu maestro timonel de su prisión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}とてつもない{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}精神力{/d}で、ラヴォアの心を閉じる目に見えない顎をこじ開けた。未知の怪物の力を抑えることができたのは一瞬だったが、ヘルムスマンの意識を牢獄から解放するには十分だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}とてつもない精神力で、ラヴォアの心を閉じる目に見えない顎をこじ開けた。未知の怪物の力を抑えることができたのは一瞬だったが、ヘルムスマンの意識を牢獄から解放するには十分だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你花了很大{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}力气{/d}，撬开了那张看不见的巨口，让雷沃的思想挣脱了束缚。这个未知生物拥有巨大的力量，尽管你只能暂时控制住它，但已经足以让舵手长的思维重新恢复正常了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你花了很大力气，撬开了那张看不见的巨口，让雷沃的思想挣脱了束缚。这个未知生物拥有巨大的力量，尽管你只能暂时控制住它，但已经足以让舵手长的思维重新恢复正常了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einer gewaltigen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mentalen{/d} Anstrengung stemmst du die unsichtbaren Kiefer auf, die sich um Ravors Verstand gelegt haben. Es gelingt dir nur einen kurzen Augenblick lang, die monströse Macht des unbekannten Wesens zurückzuhalten, doch das reicht, um das Bewusstsein deines Steuermanns aus seinem Gefängnis zu befreien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer gewaltigen mentalen Anstrengung stemmst du die unsichtbaren Kiefer auf, die sich um Ravors Verstand gelegt haben. Es gelingt dir nur einen kurzen Augenblick lang, die monströse Macht des unbekannten Wesens zurückzuhalten, doch das reicht, um das Bewusstsein deines Steuermanns aus seinem Gefängnis zu befreien.{/n}

{n}Mit einer gewaltigen mentalen Anstrengung stemmst du die unsichtbaren Kiefer auf, die sich um Ravors Verstand gelegt haben. Es gelingt dir nur einen kurzen Augenblick lang, die monströse Macht des unbekannten Wesens zurückzuhalten, doch das reicht, um das Bewusstsein deines Steuermanns aus seinem Gefängnis zu befreien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'effort {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} que vous devez fournir pour desserrer les mâchoires invisibles qui se sont refermées sur l'esprit de Ravor est colossal. Vous réussissez malgré tout à réprimer la puissance de l'entité inconnue suffisamment longtemps pour libérer la conscience de votre timonier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}

Vous réussissez malgré tout à réprimer la puissance de l'entité inconnue suffisamment longtemps pour libérer la conscience de votre timonier.{/n}

{n}L'effort mental que vous devez fournir pour desserrer les mâchoires invisibles qui se sont refermées sur l'esprit de Ravor est colossal. Vous réussissez malgré tout à réprimer la puissance de l'entité inconnue suffisamment longtemps pour libérer la conscience de votre timonier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Muazzam bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}zihinsel{/d} efor sarf ederek Ravor'un zihnine kenetlenmiş, görünmez çeneleri açıyorsun. Bilinmeyen varlığın devasa gücünü yalnızca çok kısa bir süre uzaklaştırabiliyorsun ancak bu da serdümenin bilincini hapis tutulduğu yerden kurtarmana yetiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a tremendous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mental{/d} effort, you pry open the invisible jaws locked on Ravor's mind. You only manage to hold the unknown entity's monstrous power back for an instant, but it is enough to free your helmsman's consciousness from its prison.{/n}
